column5: So I was driving down the river and as I'm going by this yacht I notice an old timer lifting the anchor....  Then I took a closer look....  The old fart was NUDE!!!!!  Then about an hour later... Doesn't he drive right past me.... Still NUDE!!!!! Lol....  Must me nice being retired without a care in the world....
you're saying that's good times  LOL
I dunno Mike, I'm retired and I don't have a care in the world either, but at least I put my pants on when I haul in the anchor
he is doing a different type of fishing.  dont let him catch you mike.
Maybe a growing trend lol.Saw two gals two weeks ago in a state of undress. Really close and no care who saw them. There boat passing mine drifting .
Dang Mike !!!! Was that you out there  I guess you didnt recognize me without my gloves
So there's something wrong with that?
lol must be a nudist. Most nudists are over 50 actually.
Mike, I am not nearly as old as you think I am.

They aren't nudists . They are retired and on CPP . if you can only afford 2 of the following 3 items , which would they be .  1 - a pack of native smokes  2 - a 12 pack of moose tallboys  3 - a pair of biege polyester pants that buckle up under your armpits
Good for him, but imagine getting a sunburn on your ...............ouch
This is the rare occassion OFC will not ask for pics
This redefines wacky worming doesn't it...
Sorry ... No pics....  I couldn't do that to my camera.... Or my eyes...lol
When you're retired there is no need to put on a pair of work pants...
